title: How to set up custom keyboard mapping in Ubuntu 20.04/22.04/24.04
snippet: This guide is a quick explainer on how to add custom keyboard mappings to the standard US keyboard layout in Ubuntu 20.04/22.04/24.04 using left-alt as a layer key.This is based on: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Custom%20keyboard%20layout%20definitions?action=show&amp;redirect=Howto%3A+Cu...
